ISSUE.TITLE: Error while Setup the Project
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The Project is using some files from inside a package directory, but that directory is not listed as a package due to which it is throwing import error while executing the `main.py` script. OS : Debian 9 Python 2.7 Screenshot : ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18033231/36127576-3e7d73f2-1084-11e8-8268-19dc6f2cb141.png)
